segments.text: I don't know about you , but I'm famished . Are you interested in getting a bite to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . I'm absolutely starving ! What kind of food are you in the mood for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd love something spicy . Maybe we could get some Sichuan Hotpot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're a woman after my own heart . I don't know many people who can handle spicy food . Are you sure you are up for hotpot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . If I could , I would eat hotpot every day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , you're really all eyes when it comes to talking about food , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , let's stop dragging our feet and find a Sichuan Hotpot restaurant for dinner !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me think about it for a minute . Let's see ... oh the name of the restaurant is on the tip of my tongue ! Give me a second and it'll come to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well ... ? Have you thought of it yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never mind . There's an authentic tasting hotpot restaurant not far from the China World Trade Towers on Chang An Street . Have you been there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's it ! That's the one I was thinking of ! I told you I'd remember it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You really have a bid head , don't you !
segments.speaker: S1
